title: As a BOC Admin, I want to allow Clubs to upload separate Add F & G files on the Player Contract screen
custom_steps:
AC:

* When creating a contract for a player, and uploading a file on a MN Contract screen (all types), there should be two new label options:
** Addendum F
** Addendum G
* Clubs should not be allowed to delete any previously uploaded files

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to allow Clubs to create single blank Add Fs & Add Gs
custom_steps:
AC:

* Upon selecting to Create New Player Letters, there will be two new options:
** Addendum F Blank Form
** Addendum G Blank Form
* Upon selecting â€œAddendum F,â€� a modal will appear requiring the user to put in the following information:
** Org
*** Default to selected playerâ€™s Org
** State
** Player
*** This will be pre-filled with the selected player
** Club Representative
** Date
* Upon selecting â€œAddendum G,â€� a modal will appear requiring the user to put in the following information:
** Org
*** Default to selected playerâ€™s Org
** Player
*** This will be pre-filled with the selected player
** Club Representative
** Date
* The modals will have the following text:
** â€œThis addendum is optional. It should be used if the Club wishes to select the jurisdiction that any player worker's compensation claims will be filed in. Please check with your worker's compensation coordinator before making this decision.â€�
* The modals will have the following buttons:
** Print
** Cancel
* Selecting Print will bring the user to a PDF version of the respective Addendum with some of the lines pre-filled with the information given on the modal

title: CSP/CEP Login - Add CAPTCHA to Login
custom_steps:
AC:

* After putting in relevant login information and selecting â€œSign Inâ€� on the CEP/CSP Login page, a CAPTCHA should appear for extra security purposes before the user can be taken to the CEP summary page

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a BOC Admin, I want new columns added to a Player's Contract screen to indicate if separate Add F&G files have been uploaded
custom_steps:
AC:

* After navigating to the Contracts screen on a Player Profile, there should be two new columns on the Contract History widget:
** AttachedF
** AttachedG
* The AttachedF column will be directly to the right of the current AddF column
* The AttachedG column will be directly to the right of the current AddG column
* When a file labeled either Addendum F or Addendum G is uploaded to a Contract, a green checkmark will appear in the respective column on the playerâ€™s Contracts page on their profile

title: As a MNC Admin, I want EBIS to prompt users to get the a 2nd C signed when it is automatically created
custom_steps:
Related to: 

AC: 

* When a user submits a transaction that will prompt EBIS to create a 2nd Addendum C for the current year, EBIS will return a warning message:
** Title: Warning
** Body: As a result of this transaction, this player requires a new Addendum C with updated salaries for the current year. The system has automatically created the Addendum C.Â  Please confirm that the amounts listed are correct.Â  The signed Addendum C must then be saved in EBIS at the time it is submitted for approval.
** Buttons: Continue

title: As a MNC Admin, I want EBIS to automatically create an Addendum C if the player requires a 2nd C after being sent down
custom_steps:
Context:  In certain scenarios, a player will require a 2nd Addendum C for a given year, with different salary figures.  Currently, if a player already has a C for the current year, EBIS is not creating that 2nd C.

AC:

* If a minor league player with a C for the current year is called up and sent back down, EBIS will automatically create a new C for that player that includes the salary dictated by his MJ Contract
* If a player with a MJ contract and no service gets service and is sent back down, EBIS will automatically create a new C for that player to reflect new required rate

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs prevented from adding optioned players to the Development List
custom_steps:
AC:

* On create of a Place on Development List transaction, the system will perform a check to see if the player is an Optioned player
* If the player is on option, the system will return a blocking error for clubs and an overrideable warning for BOC:
** Title: Error
** Body: You may not place an optioned player on the Development List.  Please contact the BOC for help.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: Print Add C's in both English and Japanese for Japanese Speakers
custom_steps:
AC:

* When printing a single Addendum C for a player that has their language set to Japanese on their EBIS profile, it should print in both English and Japanese, similar to Minor UPCs

title: Remove the "Consent to be placed on the Development List" option from the Player Letters Dropdown
custom_steps: * After selecting to Create a New Player Letter, on the following dropdown list, the "Consent to be placed on the Development List" option should be removed

title: As a league econ user I want outrighted player salary to count as LRD term pay when the player is terminated
custom_steps:
Players who are outrighted and then terminated have their remaining LRD outrighted salary charged as LRD termination pay.

Two examples provided by users are: 

[https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/payroll?mjcId=31011638&playerId=763505|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/payroll?mjcId=31011638&playerId=763505|smart-link] Donny Sands

and
[https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/summary?mjcId=31010793&playerId=354474|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/summary?mjcId=31010793&playerId=354474|smart-link] Matt Dermody

title: As a Partner League User, I want to replace the "Accept" step in the Request process with "Submitted"
custom_steps:
Context: Currently when an MLB Org requests a player from the Partner League, the League President will Accept the Request, and then send it to the Partner League Team for Approval

AC:

* When an MLB Org requests a player from the Partner League, the Request should be sent directly to the League President for Approval
** Upon the successful submission of the Request, the status will change to â€œSubmittedâ€�
* The Approval of the Request by the League President or BOC Admin will mark the final step in the request process
* This should remove â€œAcceptedâ€� as a status for future requests on the portal, replacing the status with â€œSubmittedâ€�

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to adjust how Partner League emails are sent
custom_steps:
* Rather than going off of user permissions, pull from the Partner League recipients on the email utility to send out Partner League emails

* See linked story

title: As a BOC Admin, I want VR Transactions to automatically take players off Reserve Lists
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a player places themselves on the Voluntarily Retired List, this should automatically take them off of the Domestic or International Reserve List
** This should occur even if the Transaction has not yet been approved

title: Fix Cloudflare /ebisapp with no trailing slash
custom_steps: Cloudflare is giving nginx 404 for /ebisapp.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to prevent Clubs from submitting Rehab Assignments for 60-Day IL players too early
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a Club tries to submit a Rehab Assignment for a player on the 60-Day IL before 45 Championship Season Days have elapsed from the initial IL placement date, there should be a hard error
** If the player was placed on the 60-Day IL prior to the start of the Championship Season, the 45 Day count will not begin until Opening Day
** This error will not pertain to BOC 
** Only pertains to Minor League Rehab Assignments and 60 Day IL Placements
* The error message should read:
** "Player not permitted to commence a Rehabilitation Assignment until 45 Championship Season Days have elapsed from the initial Injured List placement.Â Please contact BOC."

title: As a BOC Admin, I want some changes added to the Injury Details section on the Transfer to 60-Day IL Tx & Full Season IL Tx
custom_steps:
AC:

* Upon transferring a player from 7-Day IL to 60-Day IL or to Full Season IL, all of the information on the 7-Day IL Injury Details section will carry over to the 60-Day IL or Full Season IL Injury Details Section
** All of the required fields in the Injury Details section for either an Injury or an Ailment will be populated with existing data to the 60-day IL or Full Season IL Transfer

title: As a BOC Admin, I want "Partner League" to be added to the Transaction section on the Email Utility
custom_steps:
AC:

* On the Transactions section of the Email Utility, there will be a â€œPartner Leagueâ€� row on the Notifications table
* There will be a â€œPartner Leagueâ€� column on the Recipients table

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a new All-Star Game Special Roster
custom_steps:
Context: â€œCreate a Special Roster for the All-Star Game that is only editable by BOC, that can include all Major League Players from all 30 Clubs. Both the National and American League Rosters will only be able to add players in their Respective Leagues.â€�

AC:

* After navigating to the Roster Type dropdown on the Special Roster page, there will be an â€œAll-Star Gameâ€� option
* Selecting the All-Star Game option will change the â€œOrgâ€� filter to a â€œLeagueâ€� filter with the dropdown options being:
** AL
** NL
* Selecting the All-Star Game option will remove the â€œLevelâ€� filter altogether
* Selecting the All-Star Game option will prompt a date field to appear
* When the user selects a League and Date on the new All-Star Game special roster, a table will appear with the following columns:
** Org
** Player
** Pos
* There will also be a trashcan icon column to remove players
* There will be an â€œAdd Playerâ€� button to add players that will add a row with dropdown menus for Org and Player
** The Org dropdown menu will contain all the teams in the selected League
** The Player dropdown menu will contain the players on the selected Orgâ€™s 40-Man Roster, and will auto-populate the Pos column with the selected playerâ€™s position from their EBIS profile
* This roster will be editable by BOC only

title: Convert L2 reg tab to React
custom_steps: L2 reg page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.

title: Convert the taxi squad page and widget to React
custom_steps: Taxi squad page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Pending Approvals widget in the MN Contract Approval Screen
custom_steps:
Context: â€œRe-organize the Minor League Contract Approval Screen to include the Minor League Contract Clipboard above the current Verification Table in the Verification Widget.â€�

AC:

* On the MN Contracts Verification screen, there will be a new â€œPending Approvalsâ€� widget above the â€œMinor Contracts Verificationâ€� widget
* This widget will be similar to the Pending Approvals widget on the Clipboard
* This new widget will have the same functionalities as the Clipboardâ€™s Pending Approval widget, but will only have filters pertaining to Minor League Contracts

title: Record ebis userId in Datadog RUM
Add datadog RUM to the angular app
custom_steps: We have DD RUM in React, but not in angular and should consider having for the draft and other support ticket help.

title: Print Add C's in both English and Spanish for Spanish Speakers
custom_steps:
AC:

* When printing a single Addendum C for a player that has their language set to Spanish on their EBIS profile, it should print in both English and Spanish, similar to Minor UPCs

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the All-Star Game Special Roster to be Sent to Lineup Cards
custom_steps:
AC:

* Similar to the Foreign Opener, the lineup for the All-Star Game will be saved in the Special Rosters utility in EBIS
* EBIS will send this lineup to the Lineup Cards app instead of the standard lineup
* EBIS will send the All-Star Game roster until the day before Opening Day, where it will switch back to the actual roster.
* The All-Star Game roster will be sent to Lineup Cards on the selected date on the Special Rosters page in EBIS

title: Replace non-standard 7xx status codes with standard response codes
custom_steps: Both Cloudflare and Fastly do not allow for 7xx status codes, Cloudflare especially, which will convert them into 500s.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Add C Rates to Automatically Update for ML Players that gain One Day of MLS
custom_steps:
AC:

* When an Optioned player begins the year with zero MLS, is recalled, then subsequently Optioned again:
** Once the second Option Assignment is approved, this should automatically create a Contract transaction to update their Addendum C with the higher Major League Rate for players with MLS
** Only if they have earned at least one day of MLS by this point

title: CSP/CEP Login - Turn on Signal Sciences Blocking
custom_steps: For the College Scholarship Plan & Continuing Education Program site, turn on Signal Sciences Blocking for added security
